MAIN_MENU.CREATE_A_PROFILE: Click here to create a profile!
MAIN_MENU.WELCOME_1: See an adaptation of your document’s text tailored to your specific needs so that you can read more comfortably.
MAIN_MENU.WELCOME_2: Configure elements like font, text size and spacing, phonemes and letters. Use tools to help with reading and concentration.
MAIN_MENU.WELCOME_3: Readapt was designed for those with reading challenges like dyslexia and poor vision.

DIALOG_BOX.FLOATING_IMAGES_EXPLANATION: Readapt has detected that your original document contains at least 1 floating image, that is, an image that is positioned, for example, in front of, or behind text. Because of how Microsoft Word converts these images to HTML, these cannot be rendered in Readapt and causes incorrect ordering of other images. Try removing the floating image(s) or aligning them with text.
DIALOG_BOX.FLOATING_IMAGES_LEARN_MORE: To learn more about aligning images to text,

SETTINGS.CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: You can start using this profile to adapt text.
SETTINGS.LEAVE_UNSAVED_CHANGES: Any unsaved changes will be lost.
SETTINGS.YES_CLOSE: Yes, take me to the main menu

SELECT_TEMPLATE.CLICK_TO_MODIFY_OR_SELECT_TEMPLATE: Click Modify to tweak the template to your needs, or click Select to start using the template
SELECT_TEMPLATE.CLICK_ON_SELECT_WARNING: Warning: Clicking on Select will erase any prior profile you may have saved.
